title: Imam's Line
text:
Imam's Line () is a term equivalent to "the <a href="Party%20line%20%28politics%29">party line</a> approved by the "Imam""—<a href="Ayatollah%20Khomeini">Ayatollah Khomeini</a> in the <a href="1979%20Iranian%20revolution">Iranian revolutionary</a> terminology.
During early years of the revolution, various groups claimed to follow the line such as Islamist <a href="Combatant%20Clergy%20Association">Combatant Clergy Association</a>, <a href="Movement%20of%20Militant%20Muslims">Movement of Militant Muslims</a> and <a href="Mojahedin%20of%20the%20Islamic%20Revolution%20Organization">Mojahedin of the Islamic Revolution Organization</a>, as well as the communist <a href="Tudeh%20Party%20of%20Iran">Tudeh Party of Iran</a>.
